mapper.select: select user_id, name, frst_reg_user_id, frst_reg_dtmt, last_chg_user_id, last_chg_dtmt from test_user where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into test_user(user_id, name, frst_reg_user_id, frst_reg_dtmt, last_chg_user_id, last_chg_dtmt) values (#{userId}, #{name}, #{frstRegUserId}, now(), #{lastChgUserId})
mapper.update: update test_user set name = #{name}, last_chg_dtmt = now() where user_id = #{userId}
